block.p: Oh, PRINCE CHARLES, now you need new cuff links.

Police are investigating a burglary at the Prince's apartment in London's St. James's Palace, Reuters reported yesterday. In the third breach of security involving the royal family this year, cuff links, tiepins and other small personal items were stolen, a spokeswoman for Buckingham Palace said.
Oh, PRINCE CHARLES, now you need new cuff links.

Police are investigating a burglary at the Prince's apartment in London's St. James's Palace, Reuters reported yesterday. In the third breach of security involving the royal family this year, cuff links, tiepins and other small personal items were stolen, a spokeswoman for Buckingham Palace said.
The Prince was on a skiing holiday in the Swiss resort of Klosters. The break-in was discovered yesterday morning by a member of his staff.

Last month, a student brandishing a starting pistol lunged toward Prince Charles during a tour of Australia, and earlier this month an American paraglider, wearing a device similar to a parachute, landed on the roof of Buckingham Palace. NADINE BROZAN
